channel.title: Scatterplot on Maddie's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Scatterplot on Maddie's Blog

item.title: Scatterplot building
item.description: Scatterplots are a form of data vizualization. To start building one on Rstudio we have to download these three packages: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Loading required package: proto ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) So we want to find career strikeouts and career homeruns for all players who have hit 400 or more homeruns total. We are using the command AS to change the column title in the console.
